alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Pike; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 4:40PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pike and southeastern Montgomery Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 440 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Glenwood, or 12 miles south of Mount Ida, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glenwood... Norman... Black Springs... Salem in Pike County... Hopper... Rosboro... Caddo Gap... Lodi... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Pike; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations
